snippet: MASPERO--Charles H.,of Bronxville, on April 28, 2016. Dear uncle of Matthew Pauley and brother of the late Lucile Pauley. He proudly served as a pilot with the US Army Air Force during WWII. Calling hours at the Fred H. McGrath & Son, Funeral Home, Bronxville, between the hours of 2 to 4pm and 7 to 9pm, Thursday. Mass of Christian Burial, St. Joseph's Church, Bronxville on, Friday May 6 at 10:45am. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MASPERO--Charles H.,of Bronxville, on April 28, 2016. Dear uncle of Matthew Pauley and brother of the late Lucile Pauley. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MASPERO, CHARLES H.
